mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into payments (order_id, vippay, pay_name, receiv_name, pay_total, pay_desc, pay_status, pay_order, pay_number, pay_app, creat_time, end_time, pay_refund, refund_desc, refund_total, refuns_time, refunds_number) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vippay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payName,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{receivName,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payApp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payRefund,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refundDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refunsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select payments_id, order_id, vippay, pay_name, receiv_name, pay_total, pay_desc, pay_status, pay_order, pay_number, pay_app, creat_time, end_time, pay_refund, refund_desc, refund_total, refuns_time, refunds_number from payments
